Variant Name: Verona - 36 inch Ultima Collection Freestanding Dual Fuel Range with 5 Sealed SABAF Brass Burners, 5 cu. ft. Oven Capacity (Burgundy) - VUFSGE365BU
Variant HTML:
This Verona 36-inch Ultima Collection Dual Fuel Range is both aesthetically pleasing and highly functional. It has an angled stainless steel handle, a digital clock and timer, and five sealed SABAF brass burners that produce 57,000 BTUs of heat. The 5-cubic-foot oven has two convection fans that distribute heat evenly.

Collections from the Verona Ultima Era

Features like sealed gas burners, European convection, and flame failure safety devices combine with the quality of traditional Italian artistry to form the Verona family of professional style cooking ranges, which offer the highest performance in the kitchen.


The 36-inch Ultima dual fuel range features 5 SABAF brass burners that produce 57,000 BTUs of power. The cooktop is intelligently designed to maximize space, and the range comes with a wok ring as standard. If you want to take your cooktop preparation to the next level, you can add accessories like a stainless steel griddle and simmer plate.

This 5-cubic-foot oven is the best of its kind thanks to its multi-function design, which includes bake, defrost, convection bake, and high-power broil functions.

The Ultima gas range by Verona comes with a ton of extras and upgrades, like a broiler pan assembly, a soft-close door, two glide rack supports, a temperature indicator gauge, a full-width storage drawer, an air fry tray for healthier cooking, and a whole lot more.

There is a 2-year warranty on all Verona ranges.

Kitchen Appliances:

  • 5 SABAF Brass Burners with a Sealed Cap
  • 57,00 BTU Total
  • Two-Ring Unit—5,000 to 12,000 BTU
  • Two 1,500 to 8,000 BTU semi-rapid heaters
  • Dual-Burner Setup: 1,100–17,000 BTU for the Double Crown, 1,100–2,800 BTU for the Inner Crown, and 5,000–14,200 BTU for the Outer Crown
  • Ignition System with One-Touch Safety Shut-Off Thermocouple
  • Iron Grates that are Continuous
  • Support Ring for Cast-Iron Wok


Kitchen Appliances:

  • 30"W x 16"D x 15.5 H cu. ft.
  • The Convection Fan Duo
  • Atlantic Oscillation
  • Full-Width Broiler Element with Closed Door
  • 3000W Power for the Broiler
  • A variety of cooking modes are available, including: baking, broiling, defrosting, pizza, fan assist, and convection baking.
  • Three-Pane Removable Glass Oven Door with Soft-Close Mechanism
  • (4) Light-Emitting Diode Oven Spotlights
  • Enamel that is easy to clean and has catalytic panels inside
  • 1-regular, height-adjustable rack
  • two glide supports in a stationary position
  • 1 - a shelf that saves space
  • 1-tray for air-frying
  • one - assembly of the broiler pan


Further Characteristics:

  • Control via Touch and Timer Programmability
  • Handle Made of Anangled Stainless Steel
  • Soft-Touch Round Control Knobs in Chrome
  • Wide-Bottom Drawer for Organizing
  • Package Includes: LP Conversion Kit
  • Specific circuitry for 120/240 volts, 60 Hz, and 30 amps
  • 2 years of coverage for parts and labor

Features

  • Wide-Bottom Drawer for Organizing
    • Makes it easy to store cookware, which helps to keep your kitchen organized and free of clutter.
  • Hands-Free Clock
    • The touch control clock makes perfect timing in the kitchen a breeze with its easy-to-read display and straightforward interface.
  • Smooth-Touch Round Knob
    • The ergonomic, round soft-touch knob is both stylish and user-friendly, making it a breeze to change settings.
  • Burners Made of Brass
    • Burners made of long-lasting, energy-efficient brass offer even heat distribution and peak performance for years to come.
  • Two-Fan Convection System
    • Dual convection fans guarantee uniform heat distribution and quick cooking times, so your meals will always turn out perfectly cooked.
  • Iron Grates that are Continuous
    • Pots and pans are easily moved thanks to the heavy-duty continuous grates.

Variant Name: Verona - 36 inch Ultima Collection Freestanding Dual Fuel Range with 5 Sealed SABAF Brass Burners, 5 cu. ft. Oven Capacity (Matte Black) - VUFSGE365E
Variant HTML:
Elegant details like an angled stainless steel handle and digital clock and timer adorn the 36" Verona Ultima Collection Dual Fuel Range, which brings style and functionality to your kitchen. The cooktop features 5 sealed SABAF brass burners with a total output of 57,000 BTU, and the 5 cu. ft. oven is equipped with dual convection fans for even heat distribution.

Ranges of the Verona Ultima Collection

Featuring features like sealed gas burners, European convection, and flame failure safety devices, the Verona family of professional style cooking ranges offers the best of both worlds: the quality of traditional Italian artistry and the latest in cooking technology innovations.


An intelligently designed cooktop maximizes space on the Ultima 36-inch dual fuel range, which features 5 SABAF brass burners producing 57,000 BTUs of power. The range comes with a wok ring as standard equipment, and you can upgrade your cooktop with optional accessories like a stainless steel griddle and simmer plate.

The 5.0 cu. ft. oven is superior to its rivals thanks to its multi-function oven, which includes bake, defrost, convection bake, and high-power broil settings.

A plethora of upgraded features and accessories are packed into the Verona Ultima gas range. These include a broiler pan assembly, two glide rack supports, a soft-close door, a full-width storage drawer, an air fry tray for healthier cooking, and a temperature indicator gauge, among many more.

There is a 2-year warranty on all Verona ranges.
